```{r}
#| label: solution-set-function-dependencies
#| filename: docs/learning.qmd
#| echo: !expr 'show_solutions'
import_cgm <- function(file_path) {
  cgm <- file_path |>
    readr::read_csv(
      show_col_types = FALSE,
      name_repair = snakecase::to_snake_case,
      n_max = 100
    )
  return(cgm)
}
```
